about_the_game:
This game is about discovering anomalies.

You are trading stocks at home, but one day odd things start happening, such as someone's foot steps appear in the bathroom or snowing outside in the summer. You need to choose the right button depending on whether there is an anomaly or not. If your decision is right, you can go up to 8th trading day and end the game or go back to normal days.

How to play




1. If you found an anomaly, drink a cold water and then sit on the chair
2. if you found none and everything is normal, just sit one the chair to continue trading stocks



If your decision is right, the trading day on the board will increase.
If your decision is not right, you will go back to trading day 1.

Contents


There are 38 anomalies which will spawn randomly and only once. Once one of the anomalies spawns, it will not spawn again.
It is possible that you can't see all of the anomalies in the game before you end the game. So, if you want to see all of them, you need to restart the game.

Playtime will vary but expect around 30minutes.

Also, there are few minor surprises but none of scary or horror.

Gameplay videos and Streaming


Feel free to publish any of those.

Recommanded settings




press Z in the game to adjust mouse speed



Also, for who experience screen tearing (graphic broken in a small area), you can turn on Vsync in the setting of mainmenu. But remind that turnning on Vsync can decrease the performance of the game.

For graphic quaility, High or above is desirable.
detailed_description:
This game is about discovering anomalies.

You are trading stocks at home, but one day odd things start happening, such as someone's foot steps appear in the bathroom or snowing outside in the summer. You need to choose the right button depending on whether there is an anomaly or not. If your decision is right, you can go up to 8th trading day and end the game or go back to normal days.

How to play




1. If you found an anomaly, drink a cold water and then sit on the chair
2. if you found none and everything is normal, just sit one the chair to continue trading stocks



If your decision is right, the trading day on the board will increase.
If your decision is not right, you will go back to trading day 1.

Contents


There are 38 anomalies which will spawn randomly and only once. Once one of the anomalies spawns, it will not spawn again.
It is possible that you can't see all of the anomalies in the game before you end the game. So, if you want to see all of them, you need to restart the game.

Playtime will vary but expect around 30minutes.

Also, there are few minor surprises but none of scary or horror.

Gameplay videos and Streaming


Feel free to publish any of those.

Recommanded settings




press Z in the game to adjust mouse speed



Also, for who experience screen tearing (graphic broken in a small area), you can turn on Vsync in the setting of mainmenu. But remind that turnning on Vsync can decrease the performance of the game.

For graphic quaility, High or above is desirable.
name: Normal Days

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sometimes you encounter anomalies. Find them or none and react correctly to go back to normal days.
